snippet.title: Airship: Kingdoms Adrift - Teaser
snippet.description:
Customize and manage your fleet of airships, plan trade routes, establish industries, explore the vast sky of Europa in the time of turmoil and national conflicts. Airship: Kingdoms Adrift is strategy-simulation game with rich lore and captivating story to explore. Also featuring online PvP game mode.

Wislist us on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1597310/Airship_Kingdoms_Adrift/ 

Join our Discord community! 
https://discord.com/invite/BVcgwY6AM4
